name: Enroll Thinkific member to course via KlickTipp
description:
This scenario connects KlickTipp with Thinkific to automate user creation and course enrollment for your students or leads.

When a contact in KlickTipp activates a defined tag or event, the scenario creates and enrolls the corresponding user into a selected Thinkific course. The user’s information is passed seamlessly from KlickTipp to Thinkific, ensuring instant course access without manual intervention.

This integration is ideal for automating course delivery after a purchase, signup, or campaign interaction — providing a smooth user experience while saving time on administration.

You can easily extend this setup to support multiple courses or conditional enrollments, making it a scalable automation for your online learning or marketing ecosystem.
